ygData.subject: Re: Gob Pets in Oasis?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/5/99 1:26:20 PM Eastern Daylight Time, Sean.Clark@UCHSC.edu writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/5/99 1:26:20 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Sean.Clark@... writes:

<<
I just saw a post on one of the Stratics boards concerning an over-run of
Aqua Goblin Pets in Oasis....apparently the wolves are all over the place
for the last few days and giving very easy EXP.
Anybody have any info on this to share??? >>


This sounds like a GM organized event. Now that Verant has reached an
acceptable lvl of GMs for most of the servers, the GMs will now be organizing
special quests, invasions and events.

Wizaro Wrathcaster
